Cougaar 12.7

Package org.cougaar.core.service.wp

Interface Summary
Callback A callback allowing asynchronous WhitePagesService interaction.
WhitePagesProtectionService This service is used by the white pages client and server to protect and verify requests.
WhitePagesProtectionService.Wrapper Marker interface for a wrapper.
 

Class Summary
AddressEntry An AddressEntry represents a single entry in the white pages.
Application Deprecated. see new AddressEntry factory method
Cert A Cert holds the certification for an AddressEntry.
Cert.Direct A "direct" cert contains a JAAS Crypto certificate.
Cert.Indirect An "indirect" cert contains a query string which the client should use to lookup the certificate.
Request A request for the WhitePagesService.
Request.Bind Bind a new entry, or rebind an existing entry if the overwrite flag is false.
Request.Flush Modifies the local white pages cache to remove or refetch cached "getAll" or "list" data.
Request.Get Get the entry with the matching (name, type) fields.
Request.GetAll Get all entries associated with the given name.
Request.List List the name of all direct children with the given suffix.
Request.Unbind Destroy the binding for the specified entry.
Response A response from the WhitePagesService.
Response.Bind  
Response.Flush  
Response.Get  
Response.GetAll  
Response.List  
Response.Unbind  
WhitePagesService The white pages service provides access to the distributed name server.
 

Exception Summary
WhitePagesService.TimeoutException
